---
title: "Data Summary Report"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
knit:
  opts_chunk:
    echo: FALSE
    message: FALSE
    warning: FALSE
    error: FALSE
    include: TRUE
params:
  df_input: NULL
  df_input_name: NULL
---


```{r, setup}
library(skimr)

df_input = params$df_input
df_input_name = params$df_input_name
```
```{r}
df_input |> 
  skim(.data_name = df_input_name)
```
